document.full_text: a bloody siege at a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown in which 58 people were killed bore the hallmarks of al qaeda militants, iraqi and u.s. officials said on wednesday.
document.title: iraq, u.s. officials say attack bore signs of qaeda
lines_and_colors: a bloody siege at a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown in which 58 people were killed bore the hallmarks of al qaeda militants, iraqi and u.s. officials said on wednesday.
